All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
FilteringStreams
Filtering streams is a common operation.
IntegerStreams
This exercise is about using Java's IntStream class.
ListsAndStreams
In this class, you will learn how to convert a List to a Stream and back.
MappingStreams
In this class, you will learn how to use the map() method to transform the values in a stream.
ObjectStreams
This class contains methods that handle streams of objects.
OptionalValues
This class demonstrates how Stream operations handle situations where there is no value to return.
Person
This class represents persons.
PersonStreams
This class applies the concepts of previous exercises with Person objects.
Pizza
This class represents pizzas.
PizzaStreams
Pineapple is a controversial pizza topping.
PredicatesWithStreams
A predicate is a function that returns a boolean value.
